ing: 1 (8 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed
1/2 (12 fluid ounce) can frozen orange juice concentrate, thawed
des: "A co-worker of mine made this dip. With one taste, I thought of my son's preschool and those sign-up snacks. It's a perfect dip or topping for fruit, and may be made and frozen ahead of time. "
ins: In a medium bowl, mix the whipped topping, orange juice, mayonnaise and confectioner's sugar. Serve chilled.
